description: This header file declares interfaces for message bus management and initialization for the EthSsp component in the RDK system. It includes function prototypes for engaging with the message bus, initializing, finalizing, checking the bus, and freeing resources.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_MessageBusEngage
methods.description: Engages with the message bus for the specified component, configuration, and path.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the EthSsp message bus interface with given user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Finalize
methods.description: Finalizes the EthSsp message bus interface, performing necessary cleanup.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Buscheck
methods.description: Checks the status of the message bus for the EthSsp component.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_FreeResources
methods.description: Frees allocated resources with specified priority and user data.
